item.description:

http://www.rss.org.uk/Images/PDF/pro-dev/Exam%20past%20papers/2014/rss-grad-diploma-module2-2014.pdf

Problem 1(i)

\begin{align*} P(V=k) &= p(1-p)^{k-1}\\ G_V(z) &= E[z^V]\\ &= \sum_{k=1} ^\infty z^kp(1-p)^{k-1}\\ &= \frac{p}{1-p} \sum_{k=1} (z(1-p))^k\\ &= \frac{p â€¦
